attributes.title: Donald Trump is a White Supremacist
attributes.review: This is a disgusting app promoting a disgusting person who is openly racist, trans & homophobic, islamaphobic, fatphobic, poorphobic, the list goes one, this app doesn’t deserve to be on the Apple App Store. Do better apple

attributes.title: This app disgusts me
attributes.review: I was a girl in the village doing alright, then I accidentally downloaded this app. Curiosity caught the cat, so I opened to see what the Jazz was all about. Turns out it was just a virtual urine stall.

attributes.title: Number
attributes.review: It says bout number and password and email and I did it with my old phone and I got hacked 😖😖
I downloaded this app, opened it for one second, and the next day I was diagnosed with PTSD. No one can take this trauma away from me. Here to warn others 😳😔😪💔

attributes.title: Just No...
attributes.review: Not a good app. When I downloaded it my phone became very glitchy I think it is a virus. 100 % do not recommend

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app downloaded malware on to my phone this app is absolutely ridiculous i’m surprise that this is allowed on the App Store

attributes.title: I CRIED (NOT CLICKBAIT)
attributes.review: okay so i opened the app and i saw pepa, yes pepa pig. i got so scared. NO WARNINGS OR ANYTHING I CRIEDDDD. I am now trigged like i low key have to go see my therapist now but step 1 get a therapist . Anyways i didn’t think that pepa was real :( ✨✨🧚pepa✨is🧚listening🧚‍♂️✨✨
I hate to give a one star but when I opened the app I was astonished and terrified by what I was seeing. I never want to see that mans face again.

attributes.title: What is this 🤮🤡
attributes.review: After I seen this N00dles I can not look at him the same but I never looked at his so you get a one star bum #JayZfor2020
I open the app to see annoying orange and I don’t think that’s right. Horrible app should be off the App Store for that
